kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Go To

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=.signup-form h1 >> text="Cadastro" at state visible

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Rebecca' in the given field.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : psycopg2.connect(database=dubneckp, user=dubneckp, password=ee8Q5gfemekDwIRgt5DdgU01wK8hoYqp, host=babar.db.elephantsql.com, port=5432)

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.arg: INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('${u}[name] ${u}[lastname]', '${u}[email]', '${u}[password]', false)
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${q} = INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('Lindsay Hunter', 'codyowens@yahoo.com', 'pwd123', false)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | INSERT INTO public.users (name, email, password_hash, is_geek) values ('Lindsay Hunter', 'codyowens@yahoo.com', 'pwd123', false)

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
kw.msg: Executing : Disconnect From Database
